attributes.action: Take immediate action to prevent Steve Harris and Darren Frost from being prosecuted
attributes.additional_details: These people are not referred to as 'Have a Go Heroes' for nothing.  They should be given medals.  They need to be protected from scumbag legal aid lawyers who will convince the robber that he has a human right not to be stopped from plying his trade, AND HE WILL BE GIVEN UNRESTRICTED ACCESS TO UNLIMITED LEGAL AID TO GET THEM INTO COURT.
